SEARCH
Package Model

Class CashRegister

java.lang.Object
Model.CashRegister
public class CashRegister extends Object
The CashRegister class represents the cash register of the vending machine. It manages the money stored in the cash register and handles payments and change calculation.

      public CashRegister()
      Constructor for creating a CashRegister object. It initializes the cash register with all denominations set to 0.

    • calculateChange

      public Map<Integer,Integer> calculateChange(int changeAmount)
      Calculates the change to be given for a given change amount.
      Parameters:
      changeAmount - the amount of change to be given
      Returns:
      a map containing the denominations and their corresponding quantities for the change, or null if there is not enough change in the cash register
